text: The Man Who Loved Women () is a 1977 French romantic comedy-drama movie directed by François Truffaut and starring Charles Denner, Brigitte Fossey, Nelly Borgeaud, Geneviève Fontanel, Leslie Caron. It was distributed by United Artists and is a remake of the 1983 movie of the same name. == Other websites == * Category:1977 romantic drama movies Category:1977 romantic comedy movies Category:1977 comedy-drama movies Category:1970s comedy-drama movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movie remakes Category:Movies directed by François Truffaut
title: The Man Who Loved Women (1977 movie)
